sentences: Itoh graduated at the Tōhō Gakuen Daigaku in 1977, finishing her studies at the Salzburg Mozarteum and the Musikhochschule Hannover.
She won the 1979 Epinal and 1983 Munich Competitions.
She performed in Cairo with violinist Tomoko Kato on November 24, 2000 at the Small Hall of the Cairo Opera House.
